text:
Hire an Esquire | Pittsburgh, PA | Onsite, Full Time

Hire an Esquire is a Legal Labor Marketplace / SaaS transforming legal freelance, hiring and recruiting by automating a process which is overdue for an overhaul. We're an energetic startup team with offices in NYC, Pittsburgh and San Francisco.

Our Stack:

- Bootstrap

- React

- Nginx

- Django 1.8/Python

- Postgres

- AWS

Hiring:

- Senior Front-end Engineer

- Front-end Engineer

- Full-stack Engineer

- UX and graphic designer

- DevOps focused Engineer

More info: https://angel.co/hire-an-esquire-1/jobs
